title: McMenamin and Herring
description:
Zach and ESPN's Dave McMenamin discuss the Lakers Russell Westbrook dilemma and LeBron's future in LA. Then Chris Herring of Sports Illustrated helps break down the Chicago Bulls quiet offseason and path forward. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
